com.insanitypuzzle

Class Solution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.insanitypuzzle.Solution

  • public class Solution
extends java.lang.Object
    A solution is a data structure that stores 1-4 cubes. It represents a partial solution to the instant insanity puzzle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Cube[] cubes
      Cubes stores the cubes in the solution
      private static int numberOfCalls
      Keeps track of the number of calls that have been made to any of the isValid() methods

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Solution(Cube[] cubes)
      Constructs a solution with the array of cubes given.
      Solution(Solution other, Cube c)
      Constructs a new solution by creating a deep copy of the solution, and if there are less than 4 cubes in the given solution, the cube given will be added to the new solution

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cube getCube(int pos)
      Getter for a cube at a certain position
      static int getNumberOfCalls()
      Getter for the static variable numerOfCalls
      boolean isValid()
      Determines if the solution is valid (each side of the piles of cubes have no dupicate colors, excluding the top and bottom)
      boolean isValid(Cube next)
      Determines if the solution will remain valid if the cube passed in is added.(each side of the piles of cubes have no dupicate colors, excluding the top and bottom)
      static void resetNumberOfCalls()
      Resets the static variable numberOfCalls to 0
      int size()
      Getter for the size of the solution (The number of cubes in the solution)
      java.lang.String toString()
      Builds a string representation of the solution

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • cubes

        private Cube[] cubes
        Cubes stores the cubes in the solution

      • numberOfCalls

        private static int numberOfCalls
        Keeps track of the number of calls that have been made to any of the isValid() methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • Solution

        public Solution(Cube[] cubes)
        Constructs a solution with the array of cubes given. Note: if the given array is larger than 4, the first 4 cubes will taken and the rest will be left out.
        Parameters:
        cubes - A list of cubes to create a solution with
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a null cube is in the given cubes array
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if value for "cubes" is null

      • Solution

        public Solution(Solution other,
                Cube c)
        Constructs a new solution by creating a deep copy of the solution, and if there are less than 4 cubes in the given solution, the cube given will be added to the new solution
        Parameters:
        other - The solution that will be duplicated
        c - The cube that will be added to the new solution, if there is room.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if value for "c" is null

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Determines if the solution is valid (each side of the piles of cubes have no dupicate colors, excluding the top and bottom)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the solution is vaid and false otherwise

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(Cube next)
        Determines if the solution will remain valid if the cube passed in is added.(each side of the piles of cubes have no dupicate colors, excluding the top and bottom)
        Parameters:
        next - is the cube to be added to a solution
        Returns:
        Returns true if the solution will remain valid when the given cube is added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if next is null

      • size

        public int size()
        Getter for the size of the solution (The number of cubes in the solution)
        Returns:
        Returns the size of solution

      • getCube

        public Cube getCube(int pos)
        Getter for a cube at a certain position
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the cube wanted
        Returns:
        Returns the cube in the solution at the given position
        Throws:
        IllegalPositionException - if the position given in the parameter is less than 0 or larger than the length of the solution

      • getNumberOfCalls

        public static int getNumberOfCalls()
        Getter for the static variable numerOfCalls
        Returns:
        Returns the number of calls to the method isValid

      • resetNumberOfCalls

        public static void resetNumberOfCalls()
        Resets the static variable numberOfCalls to 0

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Builds a string representation of the solution
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Returns the string representation of the solution
